scripts.typecheck: cd auth-app && bun run typecheck && cd ../custom-app && bun run typecheck && cd ../unauth-app && bun run typecheck
scripts.build: cd auth-app && bun run build && cd ../custom-app && bun run build && cd ../unauth-app && bun run build
scripts.test: cd auth-app && bun run test && cd ../custom-app && bun run test && cd ../unauth-app && bun run test
